storyInfo: In this town of special significance, the Inquisition and Abyssal Hunters must negotiate face-to-face and reach a conclusion. They search once again for the Eye of Iberia, with time at their heels.

attributes.text: 'I arrived in this new land from my maritime home. There is no end to ghastly shock here, not a break in the tragic weave.'
'The clouds are far from as fine as told in legend, and both the land and sky are wrathbitten and hurting. Cities comparable to Ægir are all but prey to Catastrophe.'

'Moreover, the people of this dry land are plagued by an inscrutable sickness. I had learnt of Oripathy, of Originium, from many an academy record. Seeing it firsthand, though, the truth of how it has become an integral part of the land, its roots deep and stubborn, is made witheringly apparent.'
'Nevertheless, they still tenaciously live, pursue both technology and truth through their unique means, and seek to leave the mark of their continued existence.'

'Though I am lambasted a traitor, I do not regret my decision to come ashore. The Seaborn swarm is expanding; within a decade, Ægir will find itself besieged with no quarter. But someday, I will complete my travels and return to Iberia.'

'I will leave this memoir behind, for the Ægir to seek and decipher. I have no faith in the nobility; I am certain that those Ægir termed 'Islanders' today will find Iberia withdrawing its respect for them soon enough, whatever the reasons may be.'
'The Golden Dreadnought, the Eye of Culture, the Jurisprudence of Evolution, the Stele of Life. The Ocean and Land must form a united front to withstand the billowing waves.'
'It was never my intent to serve as a pioneer. All I am is one step ahead of fate.'

attributes.content: —From a copy of the notes of Breogan, famed Iberian architect and chief shipwright, written in cryptic Ægirian.
This is a matter between the Ægir.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: So long as you stand on Iberian soil, the law is watching you. And so am I.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: What is the relation between you and those three Abyssal Hunters?
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: You've harmed Skadi. Strange. Surely she intended to avoid combat.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Her blood is a special sort, more special than the rest of ours. I hope you've been diligent in cleaning your weapons.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I'm the one asking questions here.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: And I'm the one who decides whether to answer.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I gather the only Hunters granted freedom of movement by Lord Carmen were those who declared their interests during the Sal Viento conflict.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: ...Mm. Seems it wasn't a coincidence you crossed swords with her then.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: She was hardly weak.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: ...Weak?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: What a naive appraisal. She's just unaccustomed to dry land. She lacks flexibility.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Don't move, Ægir.
Comply with the High Inquisitor's investigation. The Inquisition has already concluded negotiations with the Hunters. Your every move merely undermines the basis of our cooperation.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: ...Cooperation?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I advise you to rethink your actions.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Inquisitor, how many soldiers like you does Iberia have?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: That is none of your business.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: Enough to amass an army three thousand strong?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Then Iberia is still unqualified.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: You're going nowhere!
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: (Sharp chafing sounds)
attributes.name: Sea Terror

attributes.content: What? Where did they come from?
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: High Inquisitor! Are you alright?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: I'm fine. That Ægir...
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: This was my fault, sir!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: He could easily have used that chance to take an arm from me, yet he chose to flee.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: It seems we can't afford to give chase just yet.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: They're headed for the city! They're hiding in the soil!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: This entire swathe of earth has been polluted.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: H-How can that be?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Take a good look at that gray land, and the sinister miasma filling it.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Gran Faro is not being infiltrated by the Church of the Deep. It has already fallen to them.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: Prepare to fight head-on. Ensure Lord Carmen is safe, ASAP.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor

attributes.content: This fluorescent nethersea brand... It's akin to their own city.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: It beggars belief. They're born from it, they proliferate and migrate through it...
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: (Ominous slithering sounds)
attributes.name: Sea Terror

attributes.content: Not all lives thirst for independence. It's no wonder these filthy things were able to hide in this town.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: ...But who brought them ashore?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Welp, this is just perfect. And here we thought we could find a little inspiration on our beach trip. Talk about a total wash.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: (Riffs in agreement)
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: The sea's caressing the land. I can tell. This is bad gone badder.
attributes.name: Dan

attributes.content: Kal'tsit once said the Ægir won, and that the Abyssal Hunters are the orphans of that battle. But with how things look now, I'm starting to doubt there was ever a win.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Oh, speaking of Kal'tsit, did she give us the thing?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Way to beat around the bush. Why didn't she just give it straight to that Ægir? Gladiia. That would've been faster.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: (Riffs in doubt)
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: She wanted to use the key to draw us into this. And from that view, she definitely succeeded.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Or maybe, she was originally planning to make us retrieve or help out with something. And then she changed her mind.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Huh? Hasn't she always been, like, three hundred steps ahead? What could possibly force her to change her mind?
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: ...I'm just saying it's possible. Sure, she knows a lot of things, but more than that, she's cautious. If not, how many times would she have died by now?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Uh, what are you dancing around for? Dan?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: This chapel would work great for a concert!
attributes.name: Dan

attributes.content: Skadi, Shark.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: We wiped out every enemy we could see.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: ...Formless wisps of waves are spreading here, as the tide on sandy shores.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: An inauspicious omen. We—We should not be here.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It seems cleaning up some trash wasn't enough to bring her back to her senses.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: What do we do?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Once this area is spotless, we borrow the Iberian's assistance in finding that ship.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: There are things we don't recognize on their bodies.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Perhaps a part of the Sea Terrors themselves.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: ...I've been wondering for a while now.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: How can they still evolve so fast? How are they still so full of life?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Even though we've already...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: That's precisely the question we intend to shed light on. It is also the reason I was willing to cooperate with Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: A fine woman, to be sure.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Rouse yourself, Hunter. End this before the sun sinks below. Sea Terrors who cannot hear the ocean's call are but inferior lifeforms.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: You... Gladiia? You've come. I will listen, then.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: ...Shark.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Do you find it unwieldy in your hands?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: This? I often forget the weapon is in my grasp. As if I'm dancing with it.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: That is your past, and it has almost caught up to you.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: We'll be waiting.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: (Shuddering gargles)
attributes.name: Sea Terror

attributes.content: You lead a punctual march, Dario. Have you arranged what I asked of you?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Yes, Lord.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: The Penal Battalion has readied a ship to leave for the Eye of Iberia. They've also evacuated the coast and surrounded this town by now.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Those misguided fools have nowhere to flee.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: There's nothing to fear in those petty villains, but the new threat they've brought forth is an astonishing one.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Our technology is able to treat this much pollution.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Which is only a temporary victory, Dario. And this is 'Ægir technology,' not ours.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: If for every second of every minute, every droplet and every grain of the tides beating against our sandy shores spreads the Sea Terrors and their ecology, how are we to defend our homeland then?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: We will find an answer before that happens.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Yes, most assuredly.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: The Inquisition is also prepared to do battle with the Abyssal Hunters. We will throttle them to death on this remote shoreline.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: A fitting cemetery. We can only hope they make the wise choice, and that Kal'tsit can accomplish what she's pledged to.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: So this is your apprentice, then. I'm familiar with her from her work.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Y-Yes! Inquisitor Irene, reporting in, Lord Carmen!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: They say that when Dario found you in the ruins, a thick tome of classics had lodged itself in the beams of the caving roof. A miraculous equilibrium that saved your life.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Young one, you are here only because Dario has determined that you have the will to rush onto the frontline.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: There is an immaturity to you, but you are eager to prove yourself. Your body is filled with vigor and tenacity.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: But your duties in Gran Faro will be no easier than in Sal Viento. From here on, you will only be plunging ever deeper into the heart of evil. Are you prepared?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: For Iberia's orderliness and integrity, I shall raise my sword and my lantern.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: To me, this motto is more than just a rallying cry.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: She will be prepared.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Mm... I trust your judgment, but fate does not often give its people time to prepare.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit and I have matters to attend to still. The mission of guiding the Abyssal Hunters back to the Eye of Iberia is now yours.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: The Eye of Iberia... High Inquisitor, what exactly is our task?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: ...Establish a camp, safeguard the route, and ensure that our maintenance teams can safely reach the lighthouse.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: The last piece of the Eye of Iberia is fifty nautical miles out from the nearest coast to Gran Faro.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Assuming, of course, that it's still where the maps indicate.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Fifty nautical miles...
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Once, our fleet could gaze far across the surface of the tranquil sea. But since the Profound Silence, the ocean has become like a boiling poison, melting all who touch it.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: This is a daunting mission. But recapturing this final lighthouse is of tremendous importance to our people.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: U-Understood, sir!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: It is for this that we require the Ægirs' assistance.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: You are skeptical.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: She has been to see the Inquisition's underground cages.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: So, you have witnessed the truth of the Inquisition's search, in spite of the fact it cannot obtain an answer.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Go, young Inquisitor. Time will not wait. But if necessary, I will have you put time itself on trial.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: (Pronounced slithering sounds) —!
attributes.name: Sea Terror

attributes.content: Watch out!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You okay there?!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I-I'm fine. Sorry, Mr. Elysium, I'm being a drag on us again...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Uh, haha, don't you mind it.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Those Sea Terrors...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: (Identical wounds, pounded into holes in twos and threes. This style has to be Skadi and the girls.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: This town's been wrecked through and through.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Haha... yeah...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Whoa—hold it! Jordi!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Ngah!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Wh-What is this?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: —Fluorescent... creepers? Floating creatures? Or is it... uh, coral?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: This stuff is covering the whole street ahead... Hold on, something's coming out of the roofs—
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: —! Move!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Wait, wait—
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: —No way, they already have nests here?! I thought the Church of the Deep guys just sicced them on the town!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (And wait, could they seriously have just been born? This many?! How fast does it go?)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Jordi!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Oh, I'm here, I'm here!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Ditch! Take a 180 and run for it!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: But they're behind us too, Mr. Elysium!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: —Ugh, these monsters build nests faster than the freaking undertide gloompincers did—
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Then it's do-or-die. Hey, Jordi, find something, anything. You gotta weaponize.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: W-Will an umbrella do?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: ...Yeah, sure looks like we're in for some rain. Hold onto that thing like you mean it!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Pronounced slithering sounds)
attributes.name: Sea Terror

attributes.content: —! Get ready!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Self-satisfied braying)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: —Burn it all. Together with the buildings.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Delighted hisses)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: It would seem Ægir technology isn't necessary to treat the nethersea brand.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Good, you're in one piece. What happened?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...And who is this somewhat despondent-seeming Ægir?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Outstanding strength, Hunters.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Spare us your remarks. Let us hasten to the topic at hand.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Kal'tsit has recently suffered quite the ordeal on your behalf.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: The aid she has given us will be forever carved into my memory. While what you've done... I will likewise never forget.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: But this present situation is by her arrangement. A small coastal town, a simple meeting.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Then in honor of her efforts, may we set aside our grievances and begin the discussion?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: What you seek is Breogan's legacy. You want to find the Stultifera.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: (Stultifera Navis, the 'Ship of Fools?' Wasn't that the flagship of the fleet wiped out in the Profound Silence? But how many years has it been?!)
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: What most piques my curiosity is how a foreigner can be so sure that it remains afloat.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Then, from the Iberian point of view, do you believe it to be sunk or not?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: In all likelihood... it isn't.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: However, it has not once returned to port.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: A ship, unsunk for over sixty years, yet never returning to dry land's harbor.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Can your people determine its position?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: We could once. But not now.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: In other words...
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Gladiia looks to the statue beside them.
She has no recollection of such buildings. Perhaps they had already died their silent deaths before she came ashore.
The 'Eye of Iberia.'
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: These wonders were once the cornerstone of a magnificent project, but most of the lighthouses that form the Eye perished in the Profound Silence. Only one remains.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: It does not belong to you. It belongs to Ægir.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: ...Breogan was indeed an Ægir, and he came from the ocean, but his devotion was selfless. He made ample contribution to Iberia's sea explorations.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: After the disaster, you let your citizens pour their rage upon the Ægir—upon him. Indulging such folly paints you in an untrustworthy light.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Yet are the Ægir able to swear no implication in the Profound Silence?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Walls will be the death of us all. If the two of you are so determined to continue this conversation, then both Iberia and Ægir are as good as destroyed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Civilizations do not die, they are merely endlessly replaced. But the next time it happens, humanity will have no hand in it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, please mind your tongue with Lord Carmen.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: I do not mind; we've certainly known each other long enough. But is this your usual method, Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Surgically extracting the key individuals from the gargantuan body of fate, sitting them down in front of you, and convincing them of the rightness of your idea?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: My idea is simply to save you. Iberia is free to refuse, as is Ægir.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If we count the untested young lady, then there are six at the table: three each for both the Inquisition and the Hunters.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The town square itself is an Iberian marvel constructed by an Ægir. It could not be more appropriate for such a conference.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: At this very moment, the nethersea brand is still spreading. The Sea Terrors have built a nest in town, and their existence takes a vastly different form than before. A difference drastic enough to cause alarm.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If none present yet recognize the scale of this oceanic threat, then perhaps we really should adjourn. We can watch as the precious time bought by the sacrifice of the Abyssal Hunters is whiled away for nothing.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Was our victory... meaningful?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Of course. Without it, then after the Profound Silence, Iberia would not even have a deathbed to struggle upon.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As for you, Lord Carmen, I hope you can put aside your prejudices against the Ægir. Use your—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —I'm so very old now, Kal'tsit. Let's get to the point, shall we?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: I've aged past the inclination to win every argument, as well as the strength to uphold glory through speeches.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: There is no greater glory than survival, and no one sees the situation clearer than I. You may rescind your words. The Inquisition is willing to fully cooperate with the Abyssal Hunters in finding the lost dreadnought.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: The golden... dreadnought.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I have no objections.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I would've thought contact between Ægir and Iberia would give you pause.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Contact? Ah... if you could breathe underwater, if you could visit our cities without the aid of equipment, then I would not mind showing you a true display of Ægir's technology.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: We look forward to it, Madame Consul.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: A Tercio of the Penal Battalion will immediately shore several dual-use warships at Gran Faro, establish a camp, and clean up the harbor in preparation.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Dario, Irene, go with the Abyssal Hunters. Prioritize securing a sea route to the Eye of Iberia. Pass your judgment on arrival.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: As you command.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, should...
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Should time be of the essence, I will prioritize reestablishing contact with Ægir.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: A voyage to the deep sea is a treacherous affair to us all, but for you, it will simply be a trip back home.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You will find that ship, and you will find a way back to Ægir. I leave the details to your discretion.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Perhaps it will be far in the future when next we meet.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: So long as you remember our words. We hope that once you've returned, you will be able to reevaluate all that Ægir has suffered.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Then let us make haste. We will—
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Ah—
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Sorry, Dr. Kal'tsit. Uh, ever since the part about the lighthouse, Jordi's been—
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: The Ægir, perfect. I have much to ask you.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: I... I'm a resident of this town, my name is Jordi.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: There shouldn't be any Ægir in Gran Faro! Our dossier says there are records of collusion between the Ægir and the Church of the Deep!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Who are your parents?
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: My... my parents were lighthouse technicians. They gave their lives for the Eye of Iberia.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: My house is filled with dusty blueprints, I... I may have never actually seen the lighthouse, but...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: I want to. The meaning of my homeland... the meaning of my parents' lifelong struggle... I, uh...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: You may not. The Inquisition must first interrogate you.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: And why should I consider protecting a feeble civilian in a melee?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: What if he were a descendant of Breogan?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What? But he looks nothing like the photographic records of Breogan.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Even if it's true, we should be demanding he turn over what's left of his family's legacy, and let the Inquisition take over the research.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: High Inquisitor!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: What is your name, Ægir?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: ...Jordi. Jordi Fontanarossa. My uncle told me that—
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Then you should know what awaits you for voluntarily appearing before the Inquisition.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: I... I know.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Irene.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Seize him.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: ...And take him with you.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Yes... Er, what?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: That was what you wished for, was it not?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Thank you, Lord. Nevertheless, my greatest hope is to see true, enduring cooperation between Ægir and Iberia.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even the longest journey starts with a single step.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Then we don't have a moment to lose. We will let the Eye of Iberia gaze upon the desolate sea once again.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
